title: Verify: Implement JWT Authentication and API Key Security
description:
Run automated tests for task T-066.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement JWT-based authentication with refresh tokens, email/password registration/login, and API key authentication. Encrypt API keys at rest using Fernet.
Criteria:
- JWT auth and refresh tokens implemented
- API keys encrypted at rest
- API key authentication works
acceptance_criteria: JWT auth and refresh tokens implemented
